creator: Chivalry Technology Co., Limited
descriptionHtml:
★ Amazing NEW SLOTS COIN DOZER GAME★

Do you feel tired after playing so many slot machines? Now, it’s time for you to feel refreshed！！

Slots for coin, the Vegas-style arcade coin dozer game, featuring an amazing slots experience. Every spin will get you closer to the Jackpots. And you will have chances to enter the Plinko mini-game and bonus game which brings you the thrill of winning! Sounds exciting? The great treasures and rewards are right here waiting for you to join the thrilling coin-pushing adventure! Download to get instant access to the excellent collection of authentic Vegas Casino slots coin pusher games.

Tapping the screen will drop a coin, let him drop it in a suitable position so that the coin pusher can push it down together with other coins on the desktop. The more you push, the more rewards you will receive! Drop coins, raise the coin walls, shake the board, roll the slot, rake in all the rare prizes, hit the Jackpot, and get your rewards! Download and let’s sweep the board!

Unique game features make Slots For Coin the special coin dozer game :
✪ Challenge Jackpot anytime, anywhere. High winning rate slot and instant jackpot.
✪ Authentic in-game music and sounds for immersive casino coin dozer game experiences.
✪ Collect prizes and puzzles to get special rewards and additional rewards from coin pushers.
✪ Play entertaining Mini Games, including Wheel of Fortune, Scratch Cards to win BIG rewards in coin pusher!
✪ 20+ unique different style coin pusher games from real casinos to virtual innovations in coin dozer.
✪ Daily coin bonus when you spin the Wheel of Fun and more fun surprises, mega jackpots and other casino slots games and gifts! Spin to win the mega jackpot when slot machine coin collected. Hit lucky 777, and win your rewards!
✪ Fabulous daily, hourly and quarterly coin bonuses make a lucky day at a coin pusher machine!
✪ Play with no in-app purchases or deposits.

Special coins with unique abilities will spawn along the way to provide you with helpful boosts:
★ Silver Coins are similar to a standard coin however they add two coins to your coin balance and an additional 2XP.
★ Cash is the second important game currency, and it will allow you to purchase instant boosts, mini-games and collect extra prizes.
★ XP Coin adds Experience Points to your XP balance shown on the blue progress meter at the top of the screen.
★ Powerups are special in-game effects to help you. You can either collect them by pushing them off the table, or by purchasing them with cash in the Boosts menu
★ Coin Walls protect items on board from falling down on both sides of the coin pusher.
★ Coin Shower will trigger the coin rain bonus with a massive coin drop.
★ Pusher Attack allows your pusher to move much further on the platform, resulting in more coins collected.
★ Giant Coin drops to splash everything on board, It falls from the sky like a meteor making the platform shake after a powerful hit and pushing, even more coins over the front edge.
★ Prize Coin brings super rare prizes waiting for you to collect and receive a huge amount of coins and cash! Once you solve a puzzle, the next one unlocks for you on a coin pusher.

Don’t wait anymore to play real Vegas casino slot coin pusher machines! Join in the fun and play Slots for coin! Please look out for awesome updates to earn unlimited coins and big rewards in a coin pusher.
descriptionShort: Slots For Coin the Vegas-style coin dozer and slots game
